headline: TKO Group Holdings to Participate in the Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference
summary: NEW YORK, February 03, 2026--TKO Group Holdings, Inc. ("TKO" or the "Company") (NYSE: TKO), a premium sports and entertainment company, announced that its President and Chief Operating Officer, Mark Shapiro, will participate in the Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference on March 2, 2026 at 11:30 a.m. ET (8:30 a.m. PT) in San Francisco, CA.
